TopicTitle: Problems with Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail, reply here

Articles.Content:
I donated 8$ on 31st of August but haven't seen any other mails than the one from paypal..

Edit: Finally got that e-mail. Thanks! 8)
Not sure how long it's supposed to take, but I placed an order on the Sept. 7th and have yet to receive an email. It does show up in my order history though.
I\'ve gotten no email yet and nothing in my spam folder. Have been waiting nearly a month. Paypal is the only one i got with my receipt.
I donated $10 on 30 August, though my wife\'s paypal account (Corinne Mahaffey). No word to her or to me since....

Thanks for letting us know...

After checking our databases, all of you guys had must received the confirmation e-mail in last hours.

Please check your inbox or the other email address you wrote in the Paypal confirmation form (if it\'s your case).

Cheers

Yes, the email to Corinne\'s email account arrived today - thank you!

Do I need to do anything else to link that email to this forum account? It\'s simple enough to send a confirmation email from that address, if you want one.
We ordered in mid august, but still haven\'t gotten the email. We\'ve been checking 2-3x daily for it. BTW it was ordered by Doug Ploucher.
I ordered mid august too, and I only got the Payment-Mail by Paypal..

Same story for me as with everyone else. Ordered on the 17th of August, got the PayPal receipt and nothing else. It\'s not in spam and my store page is empty.

I would probably be angry about all this, if KSP wasn\'t so much fun ;D
Just received the email Thanks guys!

I received the 'Thank you for your donation' email on Aug 12th, but nothing since. Please send a pre-order confirmation.

Thanks!

EDIT: Got the confirmation

Thanks so much!

I send my 10 quid on 12+1/8/11. I got the PayPal and the thankyou email on that day but have yet to receive the pre-order confirmation. I\'m not too bothered about receiving one as long as you have a record of it. Thanks.
Same story here pre-ordered on 3 september with 7$ donation, but i didn\'t receive anything else than the PayPal confirmation email. Thank you
Me too!, no confirmation email seen money coming out on statement.
Paypal receipt only at this stage, no 'thanks for the donation' or pre-order confirmation email.

It\'s been about a month and I only received 1 email, the 'Thank you for pre-ordering Kerbal Space Program' one.

I\'ll wait.
Same problem here, I got only the Paypal transaction receipt as of now. Donated $9.

I also got the 'Thank you for your donation!' with no followup pre-order confirmation. Nothing in spam. I had the same problem with activating my account in the first place as I never received an email for that. I only was activated when an admin manually did it., so I\'m guessing they\'re related.

Hmm... I\'m pretty sure I never got the confirmation email. I ordered on August 13\'th, and just got PayPal receipts.

However, I see a record for the KSP Pre-Order / Donate under the Store->MyOrders location, so I\'m pretty sure I\'m all set.

[EDIT: Got the email confirmation. Thanks!]

I am still waiting for my email. I got the paypal receipt, nothing more.

[edit] Oookay. I had to do a deep scan of all my emails to find it. It does NOT come with KSP or preorder in the subject anywhere. It comes as some strange looking thing about 'electro chango'. Hidden deep inside is a preorder confirmation.

I\'m still not sure this is the preorder confirmation since it contains nothing at all useful for downloading the program once it\'s finally available, no codes, nothing...

I\'ve donated $10 on the 21st of september

No confirmation mail yet.

Same here, got the paypal payment receipt, nothing else. payment made 10/5, for $7. Although my forum email is different, and might have been filtered. I had to use my work email for the forum because after several days and several 'resend emails' I couldn\'t ever get my account verification email on my personal email.

**Edit: Just doublechecked my work email spam folder, but nothing regarding this.
I also have not recieved the confirmation e-mail regarding the pre-order. I hope this doesn\'t mean I have to pay again

i asked a friend to pre-order the game by logging in to my account and make a donation, last week arround the 5th and the only message he got was the pay pal payment mail. he never got the other mail...

he have checked the spam filter in his inbox and nothing...

and the mail that i use on the forums is the one that really is my e-mail...(not my friends)

and i have checked that one to nothing there ether

Sorry for that guys.

You can check your inbox or spam. You must have received the confirmation e-mail a few hours ago.

Cheers
